com.github.privacystreams.core

Class SStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.core.Stream
      • com.github.privacystreams.core.SStream

  • public class SStream
extends Stream
    The interface of SStream (single-item stream). An SStreamInterface is a stream containing only one item, which is an instance of Item. An SStreamInterface is produced by uqi.getData method.
    See Also:
    It can be transformed to another ISingleItemProvider with transformation functions, such as {@link #setField(String, Function)}, {{@link #project(String...)}}, {{@link #map(Function)}}, etc. Finally, it can be outputted using {{@link #asMap()}}, {{@link #getField(String)}}, etc.

      • map

        public SStream map(Function<Item,Item> function)
        Convert the item in the stream with a function. Eg. map(ImageOperators.blur("image")) will blur the image specified by "image" field in the item.
        Parameters:
        function - the function to convert the item
        Returns:
        The item after mapping

      • project

        public SStream project(java.lang.String... fieldsToInclude)
        Project the item by including some fields. Other fields will not appear in collectors, such as toMap(). eg. project("name", "email") will only keep the "name" and "email" field in the item
        Parameters:
        fieldsToInclude - the fields to include
        Returns:
        The item after projection

      • setField

        public <TValue> SStream setField(java.lang.String newField,
                                 Function<Item,TValue> functionToComputeField)
        Set a field with a function that takes the item as input.
        Type Parameters:
        TValue - the type of the new field value
        Parameters:
        newField - the new field name
        functionToComputeField - the function to compute the new field value
        Returns:
        the item with the new field set

      • setIndependentField

        public <TValue> SStream setIndependentField(java.lang.String fieldToSet,
                                            Function<java.lang.Void,TValue> valueGenerator)
        Set the value of a new field with a value generator function. The value generator function is independent from current item, which does not need a input (input type is Void). The value generator will be evaluated on demand at runtime. Eg. `setIndependentField("time", TimeOperators.timestampGenerator())` will set the field "time" to a timestamp in each item; `setIndependentField("wifiStatus", DeviceOperators.wifiStatusChecker())` will set the field "wifiStatus" to a boolean indicating whether wifi is connected in each item.
        Type Parameters:
        TValue - the type of the new field value.
        Parameters:
        fieldToSet - the name of the field to set, it can be a new name or an existing name.
        valueGenerator - the function to compute the field value.
        Returns:
        the stream of items with the new field set

      • output

        public <Tout> void output(Function<Item,Tout> itemCollector,
                          Callback<Tout> resultHandler)
        Output the item in the stream with a function, and the result is delivered to a callback function. This method will NOT block.
        Type Parameters:
        Tout - the type of result
        Parameters:
        itemCollector - the function used to output the current item
        resultHandler - the function to handle the result

      • output

        public <Tout> Tout output(Function<Item,Tout> itemCollector)
                   throws PSException
        Output the item in the stream with a function. This method will block until the result returns.
        Type Parameters:
        Tout - the type of result
        Parameters:
        itemCollector - the function used to output the current item
        Returns:
        the result of itemCollector
        Throws:
        PSException - if something goes wrong during getting results.

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> asMap()
                                                       throws PSException
        Output the item by returning the key-value map. The keys in the map can be selected using project(String... fieldsToInclude) method.
        Returns:
        the key-value map of the item
        Throws:

      • getValueGenerator

        public <Tout> Function<java.lang.Void,Tout> getValueGenerator(Function<SStream,Tout> streamOutputFunction)
        Get a value generator that can be evaluated on demand. The function will not be evaluated immediately, instead, it will be evaluated once `apply()` is called.
        Returns:
        the function
